item.title: Issue #2288 created
item.description:
XSLT implicit document nodes

XSLT ยง9.3 states that xsl:variable does not create an implicit document node if the sequence constructor includes an xsl:map, xsl:array, or xsl:select instruction.

  1. The list should also include xsl:record, xsl:map-entry, xsl:array-member (anything that will never construct an XNode and therefore where wrapping in a document node is doomed to failure).
  2. The rule needs to be restated in ยง9.4 (creating implicit document nodes)
